answers.answer: Go to a neurologist and assess your leg and if your nerves are intact as you are complaining of numbness etc.Follow up near a good orthopaedician who specialises in foot.Before that go for Diabetes testing, Check your blood pressure and vitals and start getting into shape by having a proper diet.
